sources.title: CONFESSIONS OF A VICE BARON (1943)
sources.description: An exploitation movie made up of footage from at least 5 other exploitations movies including MAD YOUTH (1940) WAGES OF SINS (1938) SMASHING THE VICE TRUST (1937) RACE SUICIDE (1937) and THE PACE THAT KILL aka COCAINE FIENDS. Stars Will Castello and re released as SKID ROW.

sources.title: Confessions of a Vice Baron
sources.description: On the eve of his execution, a vice-rackets bigshot (Willy Castello) recalls his various exploits in crimes such as abortion and white slavery, in which he frequently operated under an alias.

metadata.Plot: On the eve of his execution, a vice-rackets bigshot recalls his various exploits in crimes such as abortion and white slavery, in which he frequently operated under an alias.
metadata.Director: S. Roy Luby, William A. O'Connor, Melville Shyer
metadata.Writer: Marion Candler, Willis Kent, Harvey F. Thew
metadata.Actors: Willy Castello, Lloyd Ingraham, Lona Andre
